page.title: 15Steeple Langford Shop
page.content: In the village there is only one shop and it plays a very important part in village life.It has a Post Office attached and a telephone box outside. The village shop of today is in many ways a back up service for a lot of people who use it to top up their shopping after they have been to the nearest big town.However, many people realise that there are advantages to be gained by shopping locally, such as less travelling ,saving on fares and no queuing for buses.Also with one visit to the village shop they can do the shopping,pay some bills,get stamps or postal orders,advertise items for sale and have a chat.In other words the shop is still a focal point of village life.Not only can you buy most things,but also it is a central point for passing on information and obtaining assistance.
